# W6448-23C025 Video Teleconferencing System
**Solicitation Profile**

**Reference Number:** WS3853570294-Doc3854767189

**Solicitation Type:**
Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Competitive Type:** Open Bidding

**Industry Category:** Telecommunications Hardware

## Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a reputable vendor to provide a Video Teleconferencing System that will allow for the delivery of high-definition video and audio conferencing solutions. The system must be compatible with Cisco Unified Communication Manager (CUCM) and Cisco Jabber Unified Communications.

**Key System Requirements:**

* Teleconferencing console and video networking equipment
* Video and combination video and audio presentation equipment and hardware and controllers
* Phone and video conference equipment and hardware and controllers

## Delivery Details
* Delivery Region: Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-03-03

**Contractor Requirements**
* Vendor must have experience in delivering Video Teleconferencing Systems
* Proof of capability and capacity to deliver the required system

**Bidder Information**
* Bidders must submit their proposal by 2023-02-24 1400 EST. 
* Proposals submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

**Government Agency Contact**
* Shamael Malko-Moore
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Phone: N/A
* Email: [shamael.malko-moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shamael.malko-moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Note: All requirements are subject to change without prior notice. Bidders are encouraged to regularly check for updates. Supplier Registration is not required at this time.
